title: Approving a Selection to ML Roster TX after the cutoff date should cause the player to become Draft Excluded (DE)
Approving a Selection to ML Roster TX before the cutoff date should not cause the player to become DE
Club cannot submit an MNOUT for a DE player earlier than 20 days before First Day of Season of MJ Club
Club can submit an MNOUT for a non-DE player earliear than 20 days before First Day of Season of MJ Club
Club can submit an MNOUT for a DE player once it is 20 days before First Day of Season of MJ Club
Approving a Declare MNFA transaction should cause a DE player to become no longer DE
Approving a Selection to ML Roster TX on Free Agent that was declared previously causes him to become DE
If a player is DE, show "DE" in R5 Draft Status column on the roster widget
If a player is not DE, do not show "DE" in R5 Draft Status column on the roster widget
MN Roster Reports correctly display R5 status
DE players cannot be signed to an MNC by the organization that selected them until March 15th 2018
custom_preconds: GIVEN that there is a preliminary MN Contract for a player that is Draft Excluded for he 2018 Rule 5 draft

title: R5 DE/SEL players that were non-tendered cannot be signed to an MJC by the organization that non-tendered them until March 15th 2018
custom_preconds:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/1.+Create+Major+Contract rule (1.3)
GIVEN a player was R5 Selected or Excluded for the 2017 R5 Draft
AND user was subsequently Unconditionally Released by his Org
AND the same org is attempting to sign him to a new MJC
AND current date is between 2017 Tender Date and March 15 of next year (based on system dates screen, 12/01/2017-03/15/2018 in PRD)
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to create a new mjc from the player from his profile
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error #6 "You cannot create a contract for a draft selected or excluded player that you have non-tendered until March 15th"
AND for clubs only "Back" button should be available on error modal
AND for BOC "Back" and "Ignore and Continue" buttons should be avaliable
AND clicking "Back" should return the user to the player's profile
AND clicking "Ignore and Continue" should ignore the error and continue with creating the MJC (BOC Only)

title: R5 DE/SEL players cannot have OR or TRD waivers requested during the DE Closed Period
custom_preconds:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/2.+Waiver+Request+Entry(Rule 2.28)
https://www.pivotaltracker.com/story/show/118956617
GIVEN a club or BOC user is attempting to submit OR or TRD waivers for a player
AND the player was R5 Selected or Excluded in the 2017 R5 Draft
AND current date is within the 2018 DE Closed period (based on System Dates Screen, 11/02/2017 - 03/07/2018 in PRD)
custom_expected:
THEN system should display error message ##22 "Ineligible Waiver Request. [Last Name], [First Name] was either selected in the Rule 5 draft or has a Draft Excluded status and waivers may not be requested until [Eligible Date]."
AND [Eligible Date] should be replaced with first date after end of DE closed period based on system dates (03/08/2018 in PRD)
AND only "Back" should be available on the error modal
AND clicking back will return the user to the waivers screen

title: Verify that correct comment and WCA offer amount are populated on bulletins for DE/SEL players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a player was R5 Draft Selected or Excluded for the 2017 R5 Draft
AND user is attempting to submit a Waiver Request for the player
custom_steps: WHEN the user selects the player from the dropdown in request entry
custom_expected:
THEN system should display comment " Rule 5 Draft Excluded offered at $50,000." 
AND comment should be displayed on all printed request and results bulletin, bulletin emails and PDFs
